content:
Input
* Please format "Line 1" and "Next [[N]] lines" in <<bold>>.

Output
* Please change "Print" to "<<Line 1>>: A string for".

Constraints
* Please change both 50 and 20 to 10.

* Please add "[[W]]" after "Each word".

* Please add "lowercase English" before "letters".

Cases
* Please change the validators' names to "Validator 1", "Validator 2", etc. so that they don't have identical names.

* Validator 3 is the only case where words with the same [[T]] aren't given in alphabetical order, so a simple tuple sorting approach won't work in that case. Please revise Test 3 to be similar, e.g. add "1 four" to the input.

* Please add a pair of new cases where all words have the same [[T]] and the words aren't in alphabetical order. The expected output should be a complete sentence if possible.

Thanks.
